titleStmt.title: We the servants and faithfull witnesses of the most high God ...
titleStmt.author: Howgill, Francis, 1618-1669.
Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Title begins first line of text.
Signed: Sent forth the 23 of the 12 m. ... Dublin ... Francis Howgill & Edward Burrough.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
